title: After Champ Seletion game doesn't connect??
body: Basically I queu up for game pick my champion after the champion select I can't connect I go to the reconnect page where I spam click the reconnect button and nothing happens, literally not even a notification saying that I have poor connection or something (which I know I don't because I internet speed is crazy fast) this literally just started happening, and I was playing PERFECTLY fine yesterday... so what happened? please help..

replies.body:
I had the same problem, it was on my board and nobody bothered to respond....

What I did was reinstall the game, when it began to work again I just assumed it was the client. The reinstall might take a while, it did for me at least. But when it starts working again it'll be worth it. If this doesn't work try exploring the Riot games support page, I do not believe that this has to do with connecting issues. It's a new client, glitches will happen..

Here's a little link.
https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us

Sorry this is happening to you.  :(  I recommend sticking to customs for now for troubleshooting purposes.  Your connection seems to be going into a dormant state after champ select, and failing to transfer you to the game server.  Start with each step of our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to troubleshoot, and test in custom.
